mapper.sql: T.ID AS "id", T.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", T.CREATE_USER AS "createUser", T.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", T.UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", T.REMARKS AS "remarks", T.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", T.TITLE AS "title", T.CODE_NUM AS "codeNum", T.TYPE AS "type", T.DESCRIBE AS "describe", T.CHART_OPTION AS "chartOption", T.SERIES_OPTION AS "seriesOption", T.SQLX AS "sqlx", T.SQLY AS "sqly", T.SQLZ AS "sqlz", T.FUNC AS "func"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}
AND T.CREATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{createUser}||'%'
AND T.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
AND T.UPDATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{updateUser}||'%'
AND T.REMARKS LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%'
AND T.DEL_FLAG LIKE '%'||#{delFlag}||'%'
AND T.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
AND T.CODE_NUM LIKE '%'||#{codeNum}||'%'
AND T.TYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
AND T.DESCRIBE LIKE '%'||#{describe}||'%'
AND T.SQLX LIKE '%'||#{sqlx}||'%'
AND T.SQLY LIKE '%'||#{sqly}||'%'
AND T.SQLZ LIKE '%'||#{sqlz}||'%'
AND T.FUNC LIKE '%'||#{func}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM KS_CHART_CONFIG T
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO KS_CHART_CONFIG (
REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, TITLE, CODE_NUM, TYPE, DESCRIBE, CHART_OPTION, SERIES_OPTION, SQLX, SQLY, SQLZ, FUNC, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, ID ) VALUES (
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chartOption,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{seriesOption,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{sqlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{func,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser.userName}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE KS_CHART_CONFIG
REMARKS=#{remarks},
DEL_FLAG=#{delFlag},
TITLE=#{title},
CODE_NUM=#{codeNum},
TYPE=#{type},
DESCRIBE=#{describe},
CHART_OPTION=#{chartOption},
SERIES_OPTION=#{seriesOption},
SQLX=#{sqlx},
SQLY=#{sqly},
SQLZ=#{sqlz},
FUNC=#{func},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser.userName}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, ID = #{id}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM KS_CHART_CONFIG WHERE id IN
#{listId}
